PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_WasteTerminalTypeRoofDrain
PropertySetDef.Definition: Pipe fitting, set into the roof, that collects rainwater for discharge into the rainwater system.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalBodyLength
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal or quoted length measured along the x-axis in the local coordinate system or the radius (in the case of a circular shape in plan) of the chamber of the gully trap.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalBodyWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal or quoted length, measured along the y-axis of the local coordinate system of the object, of the body of the object.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalBodyDepth
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal or quoted =length, measured along the z-axis of the local coordinate system of the object, of the body of the object.

PropertyDef.Name: OutletConnectionSize
PropertyDef.Definition: Size of the outlet connection from the waste disposal unit.

PropertyDef.Name: CoverLength
PropertyDef.Definition: The length measured along the x-axis in the local coordinate system or the radius (in the case of a circular shape in plan) of the cover of the oil interceptor.

PropertyDef.Name: CoverWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: The length measured along the x-axis in the local coordinate system of the cover of the oil interceptor.
